alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Jackson, Lee and Owsley. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... McKee, Booneville, Scoville, Levi, Turin, Major, Endee, Pebworth, Chestnut Gap, Vincent, Southfork, Eversole, Travellers Rest, Blake, Lower Buffalo, Conkling, Sturgeon, Stay, Ida May and Delvinta.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
